scripts.e2e-tests: npx playwright test --project=mobile-chrome && npx playwright show-report
scripts.e2e-tests-dev: npx playwright test --project=dev && npx playwright show-report
scripts.e2e-tests-qa: npx playwright test --project=qa && npx playwright show-report
scripts.e2e-tests-pre-prod: npx playwright test --project=pre-prod && npx playwright show-report
scripts.e2e-tests-prod: npx playwright test --project=prod && npx playwright show-report
